item.title: Favorite R Packages
item.description: Sourcing readxl - importing Excel files including individual worksheets rio - simplify importing and exporting data across source formats datapasta - copy/paste data using clipboard rvest - A set of useful tools for working with http connections Wrangling dplyr - transform and summarize data frames stringr - manipulate regular expressions and character strings lubridate - simplify working with dates and times glue - concatentate strings and/or data tidyr - change the layout of data sets magrittr - set of operators to make code more readable such as the pipe purrr - functional programming to automate iterations janitor - simple functions for cleaning dirty data tidytext - simplify text mining Modeling broom - converts statistical model output to tidy data ggdenro - parses dendogram data into data frames Exploring DataExplorer - automated scanning and visualizing of each data set field Visualizing ggplot2 - Râ€™s famous package for beautiful graphics usibg the grammar of graphics ggmap - access Google API to download Google maps and geolocations scales - maps data to aesthetics, automatically determines breaks and labels for axes and legends.

item.title: Tidy Tuesday Functions
item.description: Week Data Set Lesson Function Package 2019-12-17 Adoptable Dogs Alluvial flow diagrams geom_alluvium ggalluvial 2019-12-17 Adoptable Dogs Incorporate Viridis color scale scale_fill_viridis viridis 2019-12-17 Adoptable Dogs Output data frame to a view View utils 2019-12-17 Adoptable Dogs load Tidy Tuesday datasets tt_load tidytuesdayR 2019-12-03 Tickets Convert chart to polar coordinates coord_polar ggplot2 2019-12-03 Tickets Create area chart geom_area ggplot2 2019-12-03 Tickets Character to date/time format ymd_hms lubridate 2019-12-03 Tickets Group times floor_date lubridate 2019-11-04 Commute Add geocode to existing dataframe mutate_geocode ggmap 2019-11-04 Commute check for specific string str_detect stringr 2019-10-29 Squirrels API keys to environment variables Sys.
